ModMetaData.name: XeoNovaDan's EPOE Rebalance
ModMetaData.author: XeoNovaDan
ModMetaData.description:
Current Version: v0.3

Extensively rebalances items from EPOE:
* Re-factors most recipes and market values
* Any part above 'Basic' tier also needs the intellectual skill to be crafted
* All parts use the part efficiency model as opposed to capacity offsets.
* Power arms have been heavily nerfed. They're still good, but no longer OP.
* Glitterworld implants now have offsets based on the equivalent of a certain amount of levels
